pytraj.plotting package¶

Submodules¶

pytraj.plotting.base module¶

pytraj.plotting.font_config module¶

config font, color, ... for plotting

pytraj.plotting.plot_matrix module¶

pytraj.plotting.plot_matrix.plot_matrix(dset, show=False, *args, **kwd)¶

plot matrix and return pyplot object Parameters ——— dset: {DataSet_MatrixDbl, ...}

Return: a tuple of (Figure object, AxesSubplot object, AxesImage object)

pytraj.plotting.plot_phipsi module¶

pytraj.plotting.plot_phipsi.plot_phipsi(phi, psi, ptype='pmf')¶

2D plot phi/psi Parameters ———- phi : ndarray, shape=(n, )

psi : ndarray, shape=(n, )

ptype : str, default=’pmf’ (2D free energy)
plot type (‘pmf’, ...)

pytraj.plotting.simple_plot module¶

pytraj.plotting.simple_plot.simple_plot(d0, *args, **kwd)¶

pytraj.plotting.symbols module¶

some common symbols

pytraj.plotting.wrap_seaborn module¶

pytraj.plotting.wrap_seaborn.joinplot(data, x='', y='', show=True, **kwd)¶

require seaborn, pandas

See also

seaborn.jointplot

Module contents¶
